Package server

Class mysqlConnection

java.lang.Object
server.mysqlConnection
public class mysqlConnection extends Object
MySQL Database Connection Manager for the Library Management System. Handles all database operations including connections, queries, and data manipulation.
Since:
2024-01-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
G16

    • mysqlConnection

      public mysqlConnection()

  • Method Details

    • connectToDB

      public static Connection connectToDB(String ip, String user, String password)
      Establishes connection to MySQL database with specified credentials.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the database server
      user - MySQL username
      password - MySQL password
      Returns:
      Connection object if successful, null if connection fails
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database access error occurs

    • userLogin

      public static Object userLogin(Connection conn, int userId)
      Authenticates user and returns appropriate user object. Checks both librarian and subscriber tables.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      userId - User ID to authenticate
      Returns:
      Librarian or Subscriber object if found, null if not found

    • getNotifications

      public static List<Notification> getNotifications(Connection conn, int subId)
      Retrieves notifications for a subscriber. Returns all notifications sorted by timestamp in descending order. - Not used in the current implementation -
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID
      Returns:
      List of Notification objects

    • getNewNotifications

      public static List<Notification> getNewNotifications(Connection conn, int userId, String userType)
      Retrieves new notifications for a subscriber. Only returns notifications that haven't been fetched yet. Updates the LastFetched timestamp after retrieval.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      userId - Subscriber or Librarian ID to fetch notifications for
      Returns:
      List of new Notification objects, empty list if none found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database access error occurs

    • updateLastFetched

      private static void updateLastFetched(Connection conn, int subId)
      Updates the last fetched timestamp for a subscriber. Used to track which notifications have been seen.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID to update
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database update fails

    • sendSubNotification

      public static boolean sendSubNotification(Connection conn, int subId, String message)
      Sends a notification to a subscriber. Creates a new notification record in the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID to notify
      message - Notification message content
      Returns:
      true if notification sent successfully, false otherwise

    • sendLibNotification

      public static boolean sendLibNotification(Connection conn, int libId, String message)
      Sends a notification to a librarian. Creates a new notification record in the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      libId - Librarian ID to notify
      message - Notification message content
      Returns:
      true if notification sent successfully, false otherwise

    • sendOrderNotification

      public static boolean sendOrderNotification(Connection conn, int orderId, int subId, String bookTitle)
      Sends a notification for an order and updates its status. Updates order status to 'In-Progress' and notifies subscriber.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      orderId - ID of the order to update
      subId - Subscriber ID to notify
      bookTitle - Title of the book that's ready
      Returns:
      true if notification sent successfully, false otherwise

    • addSubscriber

      public static int addSubscriber(Connection conn, Subscriber s)
      Adds a new subscriber to the database. Validates and inserts subscriber information.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      s - Subscriber object containing new subscriber details
      Returns:
      Generated subscriber ID if successful, -1 if duplicate, 0 if error

    • getSubscribers

      public static ArrayList<Subscriber> getSubscribers(Connection conn)
      Retrieves all subscribers from the database. Returns list of all subscribers.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Subscriber objects

    • updateSubscriber

      public static Object updateSubscriber(Connection conn, int subscriberId, String phoneNumber, String email)
      Updates a subscriber's contact information in the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subscriberId - ID of subscriber to update
      phoneNumber - New phone number
      email - New email address
      Returns:
      Updated Subscriber object if successful, error message String if failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database update fails

    • findSubscriber

      public static Subscriber findSubscriber(Connection conn, int subscriberId)
      Finds a subscriber by their ID.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subscriberId - ID of subscriber to find
      Returns:
      Subscriber object if found, null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • reactivateSubscriber

      public static boolean reactivateSubscriber(Connection conn, int subscriberId, String libName)
      Reactivates an In-Active subscriber account. Sets status to 'Active' and extends expiration by 1 year.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subscriberId - ID of subscriber to reactivate
      libName - Name of librarian performing reactivation
      Returns:
      true if reactivation successful, false if failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database update fails

    • getUserBorrows

      public static List<BorrowRecordDTO> getUserBorrows(Connection conn, int subId)
      Retrieves active borrow records for a subscriber. Excludes returned and returned-late records.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID to fetch records for
      Returns:
      List of BorrowRecordDTO objects, empty list if none found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • getUserOrders

      public static List<OrderRecordDTO> getUserOrders(Connection conn, String user, int subId)
      Retrieves order records for a user based on their role. Excludes cancelled and completed records for subscribers.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      user - User role ("librarian" or "subscriber")
      subId - Subscriber ID to fetch orders for
      Returns:
      List of OrderRecordDTO objects, empty list if none found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • searchBooks

      public static List<Object> searchBooks(Connection conn, String searchType, String searchText)
      Searches for books based on specified criteria. Returns a list of related Book, BookCopy, and BorrowingRecord objects.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      searchType - Search field ('Title', 'Author', 'Genre')
      searchText - Text to search for
      Returns:
      List of matching objects (Book, BookCopy, BorrowingRecord)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if searchType is invalid

    • markBookAsLost

      public static boolean markBookAsLost(Connection conn, int borrowId)
      Marks a book as lost in the system and applies penalties. Verifies current status before processing and executes actions in a single transaction. Actions performed: - Checks if book is already marked as lost - Updates borrow record status to 'Lost' - Updates book copy status to 'Lost' - Decrements total copies count - Adds penalty to subscriber - Freezes subscriber account for 30 days - Logs the action
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      borrowId - ID of the borrowing record to mark as lost
      Returns:
      true if book marked as lost successfully, false if: - Book is already marked as lost - Invalid borrow ID - Database error occurs - Transaction rollback occurs
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database operation fails

    • getBookIdByBorrowId

      public static int getBookIdByBorrowId(Connection conn, int borrowId)
      Retrieves a book ID by its borrow ID.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      copyId - ID of the book copy
      Returns:
      book ID as int if found, -1 if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • getBookByCopyId

      public static Book getBookByCopyId(Connection conn, int copyId)
      Retrieves a book by its copy ID.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      copyId - ID of the book copy
      Returns:
      Book object if found, null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • getBookById

      public static Book getBookById(Connection conn, int bookId)
      Retrieves a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      bookId - ID of the book
      Returns:
      Book object if found, null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • getCopyIdByCancelledOrder

      public static int getCopyIdByCancelledOrder(Connection conn, int subId, int bookId)
      Retrieves the copy ID for a cancelled order. Finds the first available copy of a book that was ordered by a specific subscriber.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID who ordered the book
      bookId - ID of the book ordered
      Returns:
      Copy ID if found, -1 if no matching copy exists
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • setBookCopyAvailable

      public static boolean setBookCopyAvailable(Connection conn, int copyId)
      Sets a book copy's status to Available. Updates the copy status in the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      copyId - ID of the copy to update
      Returns:
      true if status updated successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database update fails

    • setBookCopyOrdered

      public static boolean setBookCopyOrdered(Connection conn, int copyId, int subId)
      Sets a book copy's status to Ordered. Updates the copy status with subscriber information.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      copyId - ID of the copy to update
      subId - ID of the subscriber ordering the book
      Returns:
      true if status updated successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database update fails

    • findBookCopy

      public static BookCopy findBookCopy(Connection conn, int bookCopyId)
      Finds a specific book copy by its ID.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      bookCopyId - ID of the copy to find
      Returns:
      BookCopy object if found, null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • addBorrowingRecord

      public static boolean addBorrowingRecord(Connection conn, BorrowingRecord br)
      Creates a new borrowing record and updates copy status. Automatically sets copy status to 'Borrowed'.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      br - BorrowingRecord object containing borrow details
      Returns:
      true if record created successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database insert fails

    • extendBorrow

      public static boolean extendBorrow(Connection conn, int subId, int borrowId, LocalDate extensionDate)
      Extends a book borrowing period if conditions are met. Verifies book is not lost before allowing extension. Uses stored procedure to handle extension logic.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID requesting extension
      borrowId - Borrow record ID to extend
      extensionDate - New expected return date
      Returns:
      true if extension successful, false if: - Book is marked as lost - Invalid borrow record - Database error occurs
      Throws:
      SQLException - if procedure call fails

    • logLibrarianActions

      public static boolean logLibrarianActions(Connection conn, int subId, String action)
      Logs librarian actions in the system. Records actions with timestamp for audit purposes.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID related to the action
      action - Description of the action performed
      Returns:
      true if log entry created successfully, false if failed

    • logExtensionByLibrarian

      public static boolean logExtensionByLibrarian(Connection conn, int subId, int bookId, String libName)
      Logs book extension actions by librarians. Records book extension with librarian name and book details.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID whose book was extended
      bookId - ID of the extended book
      libName - Name of librarian performing extension
      Returns:
      true if log entry created successfully, false if failed

    • returnBook

      public static boolean returnBook(Connection conn, int subId, int copyId, LocalDate returnDate)
      Processes book return and updates related records. Updates borrow status and handles waiting list if applicable.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID returning the book
      copyId - Copy ID being returned
      returnDate - Date of return
      Returns:
      true if return processed successfully, false if failed

    • returnLostBook

      public static boolean returnLostBook(Connection conn, int subId, int copyId, LocalDate returnDate)
      Processes return of a lost book and updates related records. Handles subscriber freeze period and penalties based on return timing.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subId - Subscriber ID returning the book
      copyId - Copy ID being returned
      returnDate - Date of return
      Returns:
      true if return processed successfully, false if failed

    • addOrderRecord

      public static boolean addOrderRecord(Connection conn, int bookId, int subId)
      Creates a new order record in the database. Sets initial status to 'Waiting'.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      bookId - ID of the book being ordered
      subId - Subscriber ID placing the order
      Returns:
      true if order created successfully, false if failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database insert fails

    • getFirstWaitingSubId

      public static Integer getFirstWaitingSubId(Connection conn, int bookId)
      Gets the ID of the first subscriber waiting for a book. Used for processing the waiting list when a book becomes available.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      bookId - ID of the book to check
      Returns:
      Subscriber ID if found, null if no waiting subscribers
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • isOrderExists

      public static boolean isOrderExists(Connection conn, int bookId, int subId)
      Checks if a specific order exists for a subscriber. Validates status is either 'Waiting' or 'In-Progress'.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      bookId - ID of the book to check
      subId - Subscriber ID to check
      Returns:
      true if active order exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • anyOrderExists

      public static boolean anyOrderExists(Connection conn, int bookId)
      Checks if any active orders exist for a book. Verifies if book has any 'Waiting' or 'In-Progress' orders.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      bookId - ID of the book to check
      Returns:
      true if any active orders exist, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • areOrdersCapped

      public static boolean areOrdersCapped(Connection conn, int bookId)
      Checks if orders for a book have reached capacity limit. Compares number of active orders against available copies.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      bookId - ID of the book to check
      Returns:
      true if orders equal or exceed copies, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • cancelOrder

      public static OrderRecord cancelOrder(Connection conn, int orderId)
      Cancels an existing order and updates related records. Changes order status to 'Cancelled'.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      orderId - ID of the order to cancel
      Returns:
      OrderRecord object if found and cancelled, null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database update fails

    • notifyNextOrder

      public static Integer notifyNextOrder(Connection conn, int bookId)
      Notifies the next subscriber in the waiting list for a book. Sends notification and updates order status.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      bookId - ID of the book to notify
      Returns:
      Subscriber ID if notification sent, null if no waiting subscribers
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • getDataLogs

      public static ArrayList<DataLogs> getDataLogs(Connection conn, int subscriberId)
      Retrieves all data logs for a specific subscriber. Returns list of logs sorted by timestamp.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      subscriberId - Subscriber ID to fetch logs for
      Returns:
      ArrayList of DataLogs objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • generateMonthlyReports

      public static void generateMonthlyReports(Connection conn, LocalDate reportDate) throws SQLException
      Sets the month to generate reports for. Calls the stored procedure to generate reports.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      reportDate - Date to set for the report
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database update fails

    • fetchBorrowReport

      private static List<BorrowReport> fetchBorrowReport(Connection conn, LocalDate date) throws SQLException
      Fetches monthly borrow statistics by genre including: - Total borrows per genre - Average borrow duration - Return status categories (on-time, late no penalty, late with penalty/lost)
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      now - Current date to determine the month
      Returns:
      List of BorrowReport objects containing monthly statistics
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails

    • fetchSubscriberReport

      private static List<SubscriberReport> fetchSubscriberReport(Connection conn, LocalDate date) throws SQLException
      Fetches subscriber status report for a specific month. Counts subscribers by status for the given month.
      Parameters:
      conn - Active database connection
      now - Current date to determine the month
      Returns:
      List of SubscriberStatusReport objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails
